reviews.subject: Andheri Station
reviews.comment: Good connectivity, but very crowded during peak hours. New foot overbridge helps.

reviews.subject: Dadar Station
reviews.comment: Major junction, always busy. Interchange between Western and Central is convenient.

reviews.subject: CSMT
reviews.comment: Beautiful heritage station! Clean and well-maintained. UNESCO World Heritage Site.

reviews.subject: Thane to CSMT
reviews.comment: Fast trains are quick, about 35-40 mins. Avoid 8-10 AM if possible.

reviews.subject: AC Western Line
reviews.comment: AC locals are a blessing in summer! Worth the extra fare. Very comfortable.
